actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Flood Control Act of May 15, 1928, to authorize improvements in the Memphis Harbor.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Amends the Flood Control Act of May 15, 1928, to authorize the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to construct specified navigation improvements at the Memphis, Tennessee, Harbor. Itemizes the minimum Federal share cost of such improvements.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Flood Control Act of May 15, 1928, to authorize improvements in the Memphis Harbor.
